# Kinde documentation

> Kinde is a modern authentication platform that provides secure, scalable user authentication and authorization for web and mobile applications.

- Kinde offers a comprehensive authentication solution with features like social login, multi-factor authentication, user management, and role-based access control.
- Kinde provides powerful billing tools that combine authentication with subscription management, plan building, and payment processing without requiring you to build it yourself.
- The platform provides SDKs for popular frameworks including React, Vue, Angular, Next.js, and mobile platforms, making integration seamless for developers.
- Kinde's API-first approach allows for custom authentication flows, webhooks, and machine-to-machine applications.
- Built with security and compliance in mind, Kinde supports enterprise features like SSO, audit logs, and GDPR compliance.
- The platform includes a user-friendly dashboard for managing users, organizations, and authentication settings without requiring backend development.

## Documentation Sets

- [Abridged documentation](https://docs.kinde.com/llms-abridged.txt): a compact version of the documentation for Kinde, with non-essential content removed
- [Complete documentation](https://docs.kinde.com/llms-full.txt): the full documentation for Kinde
- [Management API Reference](https://kinde.com/kinde-management-api-spec.yaml): terse, structured descriptions of Kinde's Management APIs
- [Account API Reference](https://kinde.com/kinde-frontend-api-spec.yaml): terse, structured descriptions of Kinde's Account APIs
- [Documentation site map](https://docs.kinde.com/sitemap-0.xml): the documentation site map for reference

## Section Documentation

- [Authentication](https://docs.kinde.com/_llms-txt/authenticate.txt): complete documentation for authentication features
- [Billing](https://docs.kinde.com/_llms-txt/billing.txt): complete documentation for billing and subscription management
- [Build](https://docs.kinde.com/_llms-txt/build.txt): complete documentation for building applications on Kinde
- [Developer Tools](https://docs.kinde.com/_llms-txt/developer-tools.txt): complete documentation for developer tools and APIs
- [Get Started](https://docs.kinde.com/_llms-txt/get-started.txt): complete documentation for getting started with Kinde
- [Integrations](https://docs.kinde.com/_llms-txt/integrate.txt): complete documentation for third-party integrations
- [Machine-to-Machine](https://docs.kinde.com/_llms-txt/machine-to-machine-applications.txt): complete documentation for M2M applications
- [Manage Users](https://docs.kinde.com/_llms-txt/manage-users.txt): complete documentation for user management
- [Manage Your Account](https://docs.kinde.com/_llms-txt/manage-your-account.txt): complete documentation for account management
- [Manage Your APIs](https://docs.kinde.com/_llms-txt/manage-your-apis.txt): complete documentation for API management
- [Properties](https://docs.kinde.com/_llms-txt/properties.txt): complete documentation for custom properties
- [Workflows](https://docs.kinde.com/_llms-txt/workflows.txt): complete documentation for workflow automation

## Notes

- The complete documentation includes all content from the official Kinde documentation
- Content is automatically generated from the same source as the official documentation
- Documentation is regularly updated to reflect the latest platform features
